parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_RTC_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_rtc_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified RTC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the RTC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified RTC events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the RTC event and optionally associated interrupt.

simplesect.para: Event is implicitly cleared before enabling the associated interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be enabled.
True if associated interrupt is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the RTC events and corresponding interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_cc_set Function for setting a compare value for a channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel.
Compare value to be set.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_cc_get Function for returning the compare value for a channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel.

simplesect.para: COMPARE[ch] value.
nrf_rtc_int_enable Function for enabling interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_rtc_int_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_int_disable Function for disabling interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_rtc_int_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_rtc_int_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_rtc_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given RTC task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given RTC task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given RTC event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given RTC event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the RTC event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_event_clear Function for clearing an event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be cleared.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_counter_get Function for returning a counter value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Counter value.
nrf_rtc_prescaler_set Function for setting a prescaler value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Value to set the prescaler to.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_prescaler_get Function for getting a prescaler value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Prescaler value.
nrf_rtc_event_address_get Function for returning the address of an event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Requested event.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested event register.
nrf_rtc_task_address_get Function for returning the address of a task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Requested task.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested task register.
nrf_rtc_task_trigger Function for starting a task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Requested task.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_capture_task_get Function for getting the CAPTURE task associated with the specified capture channel.

parameterdescription.para: Capture channel index.

simplesect.para: Requested CAPTURE task.
nrf_rtc_event_enable Function for enabling events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of event flags to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_event_disable Function for disabling an event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of event flags to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_rtc_compare_event_get Function for getting the COMPARE event associated with the specified compare channel.

parameterdescription.para: Compare channel index.

simplesect.para: Requested COMPARE event.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the RTC peripheral.
